entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning early this afternoon then changing to freezing rain or ice pellets this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets changing to periods of drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
